entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few rain showers or flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few rain showers or flurries beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries changing to a few flurries and ending late in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 17 February 2023
